duties_responsibilities.duty: Initiate prospecting and marketing campaigns to attract new customers
Establish rapport, conduct needs analysis and perform cost-estimates with home buying customers
Demonstrate model home and home sites, blueprints, and site plans
Guide customers through the purchase process, present purchase agreements, and coordinate with NVR Mortgage team to help select the best financing program that meets customer financial goals.
Deliver NVR’s superior customer service to customers
Work 3 weekends a month to better accommodate our buyers (you’ll maintain a 5-day work week with 2 alternate days off)
